title: How to turn NA RP card to EW?
body:
Is there anyway to turn an RP card that i got in NA and redeem it on my EW account?
I still have the receipt of the card and haven't used the code, but i scratched the card of/c if that matters.

replies.body: No worries bud! Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with that RP card and make sure to have a picture with the original receipt as well. With both of those, as long as the card hasn't been used yet, we should be able to get that RP onto your EUW account.
